title: Leaver Buster Glitch.
body: Ok, so i still have 5 leaver buster games for no reason because ive gone through 6 and its still showing i have 5 more to go, and then once i finally used my 7th one, i lagged and missed the next ready accept and it made me restart..... CMON RIOT! HELP ME OUT THIS IS REDICULOUS

replies.body: I pulled up your account to see what was going on with that your low priority queue, and it looks like you've been able to play through them and don't currently have anymore penalized matches. You should be able to Q up for matches without the LPQ now, but hit me back up if it's still giving you a Q timer!
